text: "Riot" is the fourth single off of Canadian rock band Three Days Grace's second studio album One-X. The song was released on November 6, 2007. The song was able to make it to #12 on the Mainstream Rock, #15 on the Canada Rock, #21 on the Alternative Airplay, and #65 on the Canadian Hot 100 charts. The song was certified Platinum by both Music Canada and the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The song was written by Adam Gontier about the anger that he was feeling when he was in a rehab facility. The song along with "Animal I Have Become" appear on the soundtrack to the video game WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2007. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2007 songs Category:Three Days Grace songs Category:Songs about drugs
